title: CKPatch extended for other games: Released!
content:
Yep, right. Now you can use it for Bio Menace, Dangerous Dave 2 & 3 and Shadow Knights.

[url=http://www.keenmodding.org/viewtopic.php?p=10904]Announcement at Keen: Modding[/url]

Binaries (108 KB):
These are the MS-DOS based executables which you most likely want:
[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/keen/community/util/ckpatch-0.9.0-ext-bin-upx.zip]shadowm.rewound.net/src/ckpatch-0.9.0-ext-bin.zip[/url]

Source code (Pascal - DOS, 55 KB):
It's the original source code, plus minor hacks and new .pas files based on ck1patch.pas; it also includes an updated makefile for the new patchers.
[url=http://shadowm.rewound.net/src/ckpatch-0.9.0-ext-src.tar.bz2]shadowm.rewound.net/src/ckpatch-0.9.0-ext-src.tar.bz2[/url]

Now all we need is to develop patches for the new game targets of CKPatch. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

(And yes, I know I should LZEXE or UPX the binaries, but I'm just too lazy to do it right now [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] ).------------------------------
[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/]My website[/url]
[url=http://p072.ezboard.com/fpubliccommanderkeenforumfrm20.showMessage?topicID=12.topic]Get Windows/Linux native LModKeen 2 with integrated FIN2BMP![/url]. You know you want to.
[url=http://shadowm2006.sitesled.com/meta/projectpage.htm]The META engine for 2D games[/url].
